item.title: Phix! 📡
item.content:
In English, the combination of P and H sounds like an F. A little trick to make it easy to remember when you see a “PHONE”.
So, what do you do when you combine the letters P, H, I and X?
#### PHIX! You can “FIX” it with a little imagination! It's simple, at Phixel we want to help you fix your image and design, We're here to reinvent your design!
item.excerpt: Pixel + PHP + Phoenix + Fix + X + Φ = Phixel
item.description: We love to think outside the box and "fix" things
